name: Power Rings
description: this is a top down open world 2d game, the player has travel this world and explores and solve and fix wildlife disasters and use the elements to solves these problems, but can only gain the power of these elements by collecting rings and this can open up levels to lead to other parts of the world and can use then to defeat bosses by combining the rings to call down a power suit for the player to wear for a limited time.
